channel.title: [508 CodeUSA] Player Vs Npc
channel.description:
Hello, I am having a problem trying to fix my npc vs player. I can go and attack an npc with a weapon on but it hits like I don't have a weapon. The only way that I am able to actually hit an npc with a weapon is if I attack a player then attack the Npc. Does anyone have a solution?
Thanks for anyone who helps or tries to help.

item.title: [508 CodeUSA] Player Vs Npc
item.dc:creator: @DruiD-Pk DruiD-Pk
item.description:
@DruiD-Pk wrote:

No, I don’t have a weapon when I hit them. It hits with the sword as if it’s your first it punches with a sword and hits 5’s like your punching. After I attack a player the gfx comes out and I hit 30’s and 40’s.

Read full topic

item.title: [508 CodeUSA] Player Vs Npc
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

There should be a line of code which plays an animation, I guess.

Read full topic

item.title: [508 CodeUSA] Player Vs Npc
item.dc:creator: @DruiD-Pk DruiD-Pk
item.description:
@DruiD-Pk wrote:

Native^:

Should be something in the attack method. Never used 508, but maybe there is a combat class. If you know a little java, you can fix it.

I have Npc Combat.java

I just don’t know where to find what I need.

Read full topic
